item.title: Advanced Plots in R
item.description: Enter your Email Here to receive notifications when new content is posted. Check out my favorite course here: Business Analysis With R. str_glue() from the stringr library is one of my favorite functions in R - Itâ€™s super helpful for wrangling and manipulating text in preparation for building advanced plots.
